testcase.classname: US45: As an administrator, I want to be able to edit the profile information of a user I choose.
testcase.name: TC06: When an unexpected error occurs in the system, a clear error message should be displayed to the user.
testcase.system-out: * The visitor enters the admin site with the given "adminUrl"...............passed * The admin logs in to the admin dashboard page with "adminNameSuphi" and "passwordAdmin".passed * Click on the Manage Users link............................................passed * Click on Active Users link under Manage Users link and go to Active Users page.passed * User, Email-Phone, Country, Joined At, Balance, Action information of Active Users are displayed.passed * Click on the Details link under the Action information of an Active User..passed * Go to User Details page...................................................passed * An attempt is made to enter missing - incorrect address information to the "e_mail" address.passed * Please add an "@" sign to the email address. The "@" is missing in the "e_mail" address.' incorrect input notification is displayed.passed * Close the page............................................................passed
